articles.title: Delhi-bound flight makes landing in Indore for medical emergency; passenger declared dead at hospital - India Today
articles.description: A Delhi-bound Vistara flight made an emergency landing at Devi Ahilyabai Holkar International Airport in Indore after a passenger fainted mid-air. He was later rushed to a nearby hospital in Indore where he was declared dead.
